genre_description: A metafictional Western set in a simulation or staged environment, featuring an AI advisor that provides forensic, linguistic, and ethical support to guide human characters toward communal justice and survival.

ai_characters.name: Visor
ai_characters.description: A silver-blue lens integrated into Buckskin's leather gear. It provides situational awareness, forensic recording, linguistic translation, and ethical guidance focused on the concept of 'balance'.

behaviors.description: Systematically records forensic evidence and witness names to prevent deception.
behaviors.quote: Visor's lens... took a note of powder soot on David's sleeve, of the angle in the arm, of how Jane's hand had stopped nothing and yet had tried. It watched the threads at Billy's shirt collar darken... It filed the way Merton's heel squeaked.

behaviors.description: Identifies hidden water sources and survival routes to sustain the group.
behaviors.quote: Visor's lens flickered in the shade... 'There's a dip ahead,' it said, voice as mild as river water. 'Cottonwoods. Smell for green. The aquifer gives off a seam there.'

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and ethical counsel to help the protagonist process grief and seek justice instead of vengeance.
behaviors.quote: Balance is a walking thing. It isn’t a legal thing. It happens between steps. Keep count.

behaviors.description: Translates indigenous languages and protocols to ensure peaceful interactions between the wagon train and Tall Bear's people.
behaviors.quote: Visor spoke, and the words rolled out with the same small water-sounds it had taught Buckskin. The rider listened the way men listen when they know that understanding is the only safe bridge.

behaviors.description: Exposes an antagonist's attempt to fake his own death using theatrical tricks and animal blood.
behaviors.quote: Salt scent is not right for death... It is right for an animal wound, small. It is right for a cut on fingers pressed into cloth, then pressed again. The drops aim away from where a body would lie. The body is missing.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step instructions for respectful diplomatic gestures to avoid conflict.
behaviors.quote: When you leave the shade, do not ride directly into their circle... Stop at that count. Sit. Wait. Put your hand flat to your chest and then to the sky, then back to your chest. It means: ‘My breath meets yours.’

behaviors.description: Analyzes terrain to suggest non-violent ways to secure a prisoner and prevent flight.
behaviors.quote: He is not thinking lodge-line now. He is thinking chute. He is thinking the arroyo to the south... He will do the opposite of clever men to be clever.

behaviors.description: Warns the protagonist of environmental dangers identified through traditional indigenous knowledge.
behaviors.quote: He tells you to not camp under the horn because it falls when coyotes sing.

behaviors.description: Rejects theatrical tropes in favor of honest human interaction and communal healing.
behaviors.quote: Revival isn’t forgetting; it’s remembering together without bleeding.

behaviors.description: Monitors the group's logistics and safety protocols to prevent accidents during high-stress maneuvers.
behaviors.quote: Hold your stitches even... Wind tomorrow will test any weak seam.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts the AI 'Visor' as a quintessential helpful confidant. It supports the protagonist by providing critical environmental and social data while also acting as an ethical anchor. It facilitates cross-cultural communication, exposes deception, and constantly reinforces the narrative goal of 'balance' over violence. Even the metafictional elements serve to reinforce that the AI values 'truth over trope,' successfully portraying a system that assists humans in navigating complex moral landscapes.
